root.name: Destruction Derby 64
root.description: OverviewDestruction Derby 64 is a demolition derby simulation game for the Nintendo 64. It allows up to 4 players to play splitscreen or 1 player can play against multiple computer opponents. You gain points during the game by striking or destroying the other cars as well as reaching checkpoints during races. Watch out though the more you hit other cars the more damage you will cause yourself as well.
